abstract: Former American Hockey League player Nathan Paetsch pleads guilty to his part in illegal sports betting business; will be sentenced to probation, 400 hours of community service and eight months of home confinement.
lead_paragraph: Nathan Paetsch will receive probation, 400 hours of community service and eight months of home confinement.

headline.main: A.H.L. Player Pleads Guilty in Sports Betting Case

snippet: Nathan Paetsch will receive probation, 400 hours of community service and eight months of home confinement.
